contacts.title: Law Enforcement Requests
contacts.description:
Welcome to the request system for law enforcement agencies. Government and law enforcement agencies can use this system to send information requests. 

Each case will be reviewed, and cooperation will be carried out for each request for information disclosure in accordance with the Terms of Use of WellWallet and applicable laws.

form.title: For government and law enforcement agencies only.
form.description: If you have an urgent request, please indicate “Urgent” in the body of the message, and we will process it immediately.​
form.info: Please note that requests from organizations sent through a VPN will not be processed.​
